com.atakmap.android.toolbar

Interface ToolListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractSheetDropDown, CircleDetailsView, EllipseDetailsView, GenericDetailsView, GenericPointDetailsView, ImageDetailsView, MultiPolylineDetailsView, RangeAndBearingCircleDropDown, RectangleDetailsView, RubberImageDropDown, RubberModelDropDown, SensorDetailsView, ShapeDetailsView, SpotMapPointDetailsView, VehicleDetailsView, VehicleModelDetailsView

    public interface ToolListener
    Simple listener for when a tool is started or ended

    • Method Summary
